idea-plugin.name: Fast Java
idea-plugin.description:
Fast-Java-Plugin

fast-java-plugin is a fast code generation tool.
support build #IU-181.*
Contains directories.
  • domain
  • controller
  • service
  • service.impl
At the same time, it supports relying on Fast-Java library, Fast-Java library, an agile development library based on MongoDB.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Initialize fast-java-plugin the project, Version V1.0
  • Compression plug-in volume
  • Remove unnecessary dependencies

action.description: Agile business development with on click
